Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:44:58
Folder: C1UTF3Z - let's celebrate our successes nominate for chalhoub excellence awards!
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1UTF3Z_00
From: Fadi Jabbour <Fadi.Jabbour@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-18 12:52
Subject: Let's Celebrate Our Successes | Nominate for Chalhoub Excellence Awards!
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear Colleagues,

 

As we approach the end of the year, I would like to take this opportunity to acknowledge the progress and achievements we've collectively reached. Your commitment and collaboration have driven our success, even through challenging times.

 

Though it’s November, we’re not done yet! This is a perfect time to reflect on our efforts and recognize the outstanding contributions that have made our journey this year truly remarkable.

 

I encourage you to participate in the Chalhoub Excellence Awards by nominating yourself or a colleague – whether as an individual or a team – whose efforts deserve the spotlight. 

 

With only a few weeks left, let’s make sure that every deserving team member has the chance to be recognized as we close out the year on a high note.

With only a few weeks left, let’s make sure that every deserving team member has the chance to be recognized as we close out the year on a high note.
